techmeme.title: Accel: VC funding for cloud startups in the US, Europe, and Israel to rise 27% YoY to $79.2B in 2024, with 40% of the funding going to generative AI startups (Ryan Browne/CNBC)
Open Source Initiative says Meta is "polluting" the term open-source by using it for its Llama models; OSI to publish its definition of open-source AI next week (Richard Waters/Financial Times)
Filing: Google asks the US 9th Circuit for an emergency stay on the Epic ruling, saying the short time it was given to make Play Store changes risks user safety (The Verge)
Brazilian authorities have arrested a hacker, known as USDoD, who they allege is linked to breaches of National Public Data, the FBI's InfraGard, and others (Lawrence Abrams/BleepingComputer)
Everstage, which offers sales performance management software, raised a $30M Series B led by Eight Roads Ventures, bringing its total raised to $45M (Duncan Riley/SiliconANGLE)
